arts.ttl: BUNDESLIGA PLAYER RATINGS | Borussia Mönchengladbach 0-0 Hamburger SV
arts.sum: After seven long years, to round out the opening weekend, Borussia Mönchengladbach hosted Hamburger SV In a nice turn of events, the last Bundesliga game that Hamburg played was against…

arts.ttl: HSV hold Gladbach to draw in Bundesliga return
arts.sum: Borussia Mönchengladbach and Hamburger SV shared the spoils in a goalless draw at Borussia-Park.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs Hamburger SV
arts.sum: Here are the official starting XIs for today's Bundesliga clash between Borussia Mönchengladbach and Hamburger SV.

arts.ttl: Gladbach vs. Hamburg preview: HSV play first Bundesliga match in seven years
arts.sum: Hamburger SV will play their first Bundesliga match in seven years when they travel to Borussia-Park for Sunday’s meeting with Borussia Mönchengladbach.
